name: hypothyroidism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a condition in which the thyroid gland does not produce enough thyroid hormone, leading to heart problems, problems with nerve function in the hands and feet, and mental health issues such as depression: Muscular hypertrophy is one of the signs of hypothyroidism.
